responsibilities: Own the development of new customer-facing ChatGPT and OpenAI API features end-to-end, both on-premises and in the cloud, for public sector customers.
Partner and directly embed with teams across the business, including engineering, security, and compliance, to enable products to work within the unique constraints of new environments.
Talk to users to understand their problems and design solutions to address them.
Work with the research team to get relevant feedback and iterate on their latest models.
Collaborate with a cross-functional team of engineers, researchers, product managers, designers, and operations folks to create cutting-edge products.
Optimize applications for speed and scale.
qualifications: Proficiency with JavaScript, React, and other web technologies.
Proficiency with some backend language (e.g., Python).
Some experience with underlying infrastructure primitives like Kubernetes and Terraform.
Ability to move fast in an environment where things are sometimes loosely defined and may have competing priorities or deadlines.
Interest in AI/ML (direct experience not required).
analysis: The job responsibilities include the development of new customer-facing features using ChatGPT and OpenAI API, which are directly related to Generative AI and language models. The mention of "ChatGPT" and "OpenAI API" explicitly indicates that the job involves working with language models. Additionally, the responsibility to work with the research team to iterate on their latest models further suggests involvement with AI models, likely including LLMs. The skills section mentions an interest in AI/ML, which aligns with the responsibilities involving AI technologies. Overall, the job clearly involves working with Generative AI and language models.
